name: briefcase
title: Briefcase
description: Transform selected text case with smart cycling. Works globally across applications.
author: robinn

commands.name: briefcase
commands.title: Briefcase
commands.description: Toggle case of selected text (UPPER ↔ lower ↔ Title Case)

commands.name: titlecase
commands.title: Title Case
commands.description: Convert selected text to Title Case

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
